name: Stealth Sneakers - Top-Down Heist Game
description:
Stealth Sneakers is a top-down 2D stealth game where you sneak around a map to collect loot and escape with said loot. 

Security cameras will rotate their field of view to try and detect you. When you are in the camera's FOV, the security's suspicion goes up. Once you hit max suspicion, game over.

Use [W][A][S][D] to move and space to toggle a nightvision mode.
